idea: At Tech Care for All India we know that digital health is poised to accelerate sustainable access to quality care and upend how healthcare is delivered in India. We’re a social impact company fully dedicated to accelerating progress toward universal health coverage (Goal #3 in the UN’s global Sustainable Development Agenda). We accomplish our mission by developing, licensing, validating and commercializing digital health technologies we believe will make an outsize impact on healthcare and health outcomes throughout India and beyond. Our flagship product, Medical Learning Hub, enables healthcare providers to search and book a wealth of training opportunities, most at absolutely no cost to them. Our ambition as a company is to radically democratize medical education, touching the lives of 100 million patients by 2025.
name: TECH CARE FOR ALL INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED
